commit.message:
Rollup merge of #61364 - lzutao:stabilize-reverse_bits, r=Centril

Stabilize reverse_bits feature

FCP done in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/48763#issuecomment-497349379

Closes #48763

r? @Centril
